name: Guha Athreya
company: Current customer at Ai Palette and previously at Asper.ai
content: I have had the pleasure of working with Vikram and his recruitment agency on multiple occasions, and each time, they have exceeded my expectations. Their unique approach to understanding the specific needs of the job beyond the written description has resulted in a consistently high success rate in finding the right talent, especially for niche roles. His thorough vetting process makes him an invaluable partner. I highly recommend Vikram and his team to anyone looking for top-tier recruitment services.
